title: CT transcode output specification for videos

output_type.description: Type of the file to output

output_bucket.description: S3 bucket and path where the output file will be uploaded

output_file.description: Filename where to upload the resulting file

s3_rrs.description: Activate reduced redundancy or not in S3 storage

preset.description: Preset to use to transcode the file

video_codec.description: Override the video codec used by codec

audio_codec.description: Override the audio codec used by preset

video_bitrate.description: Override default preset bitrate for video. In Kbits/s.

audio_bitrate.description: Override default preset bitrate for audio. In Kbits/s.

keep_ratio.description: Keep the video ratio. If true and ratio change, the transcode will fail.

no_enlarge.description: If size provided is bigger than original the transcode will fail.
